Crypto Local Currency Converter is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension that helps you quickly convert major cryptocurrencies to your local currency.

### Key Features:
• Automatic location-based currency detection
• Real-time cryptocurrency price updates
• Support for multiple major cryptocurrencies
• One-click amount copying
• Clean, intuitive interface
• Privacy-focused with no data collection

### How it works:
1. Click the extension icon
2. Select your cryptocurrency
3. Enter the amount
4. Instantly see the converted amount in your local currency
5. Copy the amount with one click

### Technical Details:
• Uses real-time cryptocurrency data from CoinGecko
• Automatic price updates every minute
• Supports all major world currencies
• No registration or setup required

### Privacy:
• No personal data collection
• Location detection only for currency selection
• No analytics or tracking
• Open privacy policy available

Simple, fast, and reliable - get instant cryptocurrency conversions in your local currency!
